file.name: videostreaming.openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.3"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Cios Video Streaming Openapi

paths:
  "/v2/video_streams":
    get:
      tags:
        - videostreaming-operations
      operationId: getVideoStreamsList
      parameters:
        - $ref: '../components/parameters.yml#/components/parameters/resource_owner_id_query_required'
        - $ref: '../components/parameters.yml#/components/parameters/device_id_query'
        - $ref: '../components/parameters.yml#/components/parameters/is_enable'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 成功
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '../components/videostreaming-component.openapi.yml#/components/schemas/MultipleVideo'
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
  "/v2/video_streams/{video_id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - videostreaming-operations
      operationId: getVideoStreams
      parameters:
        - $ref: '../components/parameters.yml#/components/parameters/video_id'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 成功
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '../components/videostreaming-component.openapi.yml#/components/schemas/SingleVideo'
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
    patch:
      tags:
        - videostreaming-operations
      operationId: updateStreams
      parameters:
        - $ref: '../components/parameters.yml#/components/parameters/video_id'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '../components/videostreaming-component.openapi.yml#/components/schemas/VideoUpdateRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 成功
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '../components/videostreaming-component.openapi.yml#/components/schemas/SingleVideo'
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
  "/v2/video_streams/{video_id}/thumbnail":
    get:
      tags:
        - videostreaming-operations
      operationId: getVideoStreamsThumbnail
      parameters:
        - $ref: '../components/parameters.yml#/components/parameters/video_id'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 成功
          content:
            image/png:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
  "/v2/video_streams/{video_id}/play":
    post:
      tags:
        - videostreaming-operations
      operationId: createVideoStreamsPlay
      parameters:
        - $ref: '../components/parameters.yml#/components/parameters/video_id'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 成功
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '../components/videostreaming-component.openapi.yml#/components/schemas/SingleRoom'
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
  "/v2/video_streams/{video_id}/stop":
    post:
      tags:
        - videostreaming-operations
      operationId: createVideoStreamsStop
      parameters:
        - $ref: '../components/parameters.yml#/components/parameters/video_id'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 成功
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []

components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/v2/video_streams/{video_id}/play": post: operation "createVideoStreamsPlay": parameters: parse parameter "": at 1:1824: resolve "../components/parameters.yml#/components/parameters/video_id" reference: external "../components/parameters.yml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
